Package net.jsign

Class PESigner

java.lang.Object
net.jsign.AuthenticodeSigner
net.jsign.PESigner
@Deprecated public class PESigner extends AuthenticodeSigner
Deprecated.
Use AuthenticodeSigner instead
Sign a portable executable file. Timestamping is enabled by default and relies on the Sectigo server (http://timestamp.sectigo.com).
Since:
1.0
Author:
Emmanuel Bourg
See Also:
  • Windows Authenticode Portable Executable Signature Format
  • Time Stamping Authenticode Signatures

  • Constructor Details

    • PESigner

      public PESigner(Certificate[] chain, PrivateKey privateKey)
      Deprecated.
      Create a PESigner with the specified certificate chain and private key.
      Parameters:
      chain - the certificate chain. The first certificate is the signing certificate
      privateKey - the private key
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the chain is empty

    • PESigner

      public PESigner(KeyStore keystore, String alias, String password) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException, KeyStoreException, UnrecoverableKeyException
      Deprecated.
      Create a PESigner with a certificate chain and private key from the specified keystore.
      Parameters:
      keystore - the keystore holding the certificate and the private key
      alias - the alias of the certificate in the keystore
      password - the password to get the private key
      Throws:
      KeyStoreException - if the keystore has not been initialized (loaded).
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the algorithm for recovering the key cannot be found
      UnrecoverableKeyException - if the key cannot be recovered (e.g., the given password is wrong).

    • withSignaturesReplaced

      public PESigner withSignaturesReplaced(boolean replace)
      Deprecated.
      Enable or disable the replacement of the previous signatures (disabled by default).
      Overrides:
      withSignaturesReplaced in class AuthenticodeSigner
      Parameters:
      replace - true if the new signature should replace the existing ones, false to append it
      Returns:
      the current signer
      Since:
      2.0

      Overrides:

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the current signer

    • withTimestampingAutority

      public PESigner withTimestampingAutority(String url)
      Deprecated.
      Use withTimestampingAuthority(String) instead
      Set the URL of the timestamping authority. Both RFC 3161 (as used for jar signing) and Authenticode timestamping services are supported.
      Parameters:
      url - the URL of the timestamping authority
      Returns:
      the current signer

    • withTimestampingAutority

      public PESigner withTimestampingAutority(String... urls)
      Deprecated.
      Use withTimestampingAuthority(String...) instead

      Parameters:
      urls - the URLs of the timestamping authorities
      Returns:
      the current signer
      Since:
      2.0
